GameView

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameView.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Class GameView
    Class responsible for show and manage the game when user is playing
